Title: Establishes a carbon farming tax credit for farmers
Summary: Establishes a tax credit for farmers who maximize carbon sequestration potential through a "carbon farming" land management strategy; directs DEC to develop regulations related to certifying the amount of carbon sequestered or emissions reduced.
LawCode: Amd §§150 & 16, Ag & Mkts L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L; amd §§3-0301 & 19-0309, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, the tax law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to enacting the carbon farming act
